Cosine function

Source: R/fn_cos.R
fn_cos.Rd

This function computes the approximation to the cosine function.

fn_cos(x, k)

Arguments

x

A numeric() number of length N.

k

An integer() that is greater than or equal to 1.

Value

An integer() or numeric() number that is the cosine of x.

Details

This function computes the cosine of a number using the truncated series expansion

Examples

## Generate some input data
x <- `2`
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object '2' not found
k <- "10"

## Perform the cosine calculation
fn_cos(x, k)
